channel.title: DUEL PROBLEM how i fix?
channel.description: i have duel on my server nice but its not easy to accept "challenge" i send to other player challenge thing but he see only duelreg: and how to accept?he most trade with me to accept duel i want this playername want duel with you same like trade how i make that can anny1 help me plz?

item.title: DUEL PROBLEM how i fix?
item.dc:creator: @azza123 azza123
item.description:
@azza123 wrote:

you will have to make a public void that says when he clicks on “playername wants to duel” it brings up the duel screen, and a public void that makes “playername wants to duel”, im not too sure on how to do as I personally have never looked at dueling but for the playername bit you might want something like this "+playerName+" wants to duel
however that is only an educated guess! :o
